AT.name: Resident Evil™ Revelations
AT.description: Resident Evil™ Revelations für Nintendo 3DS bringt markerschütternden Schrecken in die Welt der tragbaren Konsolen. Fans der kultigen Überlebenshorror-Serie sollten sich diesen Titel auf keinen Fall entgehen lassen! Zeitlich ist der Schocker zwischen Resident Evil 4™ und Resident Evil 5™ angesiedelt und wartet mit einer brandneuen Spielgeschichte für die Serienfavoriten Jill Valentine und Chris Redfield auf. Zudem werden mit Parker Luciani und Jessica Sherawat zwei neue Charaktere eingeführt und komplett neue, originell gestaltete Umgebungen erwarten den Spieler zur vorsichtigen Erkundung.

AU.name: Resident Evil™ Revelations
AU.description: Resident Evil™ Revelations for Nintendo 3DS brings a straight shot of spine-chilling terror to the handheld console scene, one that fans of the iconic survival horror series won’t want to miss! Set in the time period between Resident Evil 4™ and Resident Evil 5™, this title features a brand new storyline for series favourites Jill Valentine and Chris Redfield, introduces new characters Parker Luciani and Jessica Sherawat, and offers entirely original environments for players to cautiously explore.

BG.name: Resident Evil™ Revelations
BG.description: Resident Evil™ Revelations for Nintendo 3DS brings a straight shot of spine-chilling terror to the handheld console scene, one that fans of the iconic survival horror series won’t want to miss! Set in the time period between Resident Evil 4™ and Resident Evil 5™, this title features a brand new storyline for series favourites Jill Valentine and Chris Redfield, introduces new characters Parker Luciani and Jessica Sherawat, and offers entirely original environments for players to cautiously explore.

BE.name: Resident Evil™ Revelations
BE.description: Avis aux fans de la célèbre série de survival-horror : Resident Evil™ Revelations va vous glacer le sang dans ce nouvel opus sur Nintendo 3DS ! Se déroulant entre Resident Evil 4™ et Resident Evil 5™, le jeu propose un nouveau scénario réunissant les héros de la série, Jill Valentine et Chris Redfield, et de nouveaux personnages, Parker Luciani et Jessica Sherawat. Les joueurs pourront également explorer, avec la plus grande prudence, des environnements entièrement inédits.

ES.name: Resident Evil™ Revelations
ES.description: ¡No te pierdas Resident Evil™ Revelations para Nintendo 3DS, que trae el terror más tradicional de la saga a la consola portátil! Localizado en el periodo ocurrido entre Resident Evil 4 y Resident Evil 5, este juego presenta un nuevo argumento protagonizado por los admirados Jill Valentine y Chris Redfield, introduce a nuevos personajes como Parker Luciani y Jessica Sherawat, y ofrece nuevos y originales entornos para que los jugadores los exploren con cautela.

IT.name: Resident Evil™ Revelations
IT.description: Resident Evil™ Revelations per Nintendo 3DS porta sulla tua console portatile l'agghiacciante terrore della leggendaria serie survival-horror! Ambientato nel periodo di tempo tra Resident Evil 4 e Resident Evil 5, il titolo presenta una storia inedita in cui troverai i celebri protagonisti della serie, Jill Valentine e Chris Redfield, affiancati dai nuovi personaggi Parker Luciani e Jessica Sherawat, e ambienti nuovi e originali da esplorare con estrema cautela.

NO.name: Resident Evil™ Revelations
NO.description: Resident Evil™ Revelations for Nintendo 3DS brings a straight shot of spine-chilling terror to the handheld console scene, one that fans of the iconic survival horror series won’t want to miss! Set in the time period between Resident Evil 4™ and Resident Evil 5™, this title features a brand new storyline for series favourites Jill Valentine and Chris Redfield, introduces new characters Parker Luciani and Jessica Sherawat, and offers entirely original environments for players to cautiously explore.

NL.name: Resident Evil™ Revelations
NL.description: Resident Evil™ Revelations voor Nintendo 3DS brengt kippenvel en koude rillingen naar draagbare spelsystemen. Fans van de roemruchte 'survival horror'-serie mogen dit niet missen! Resident Evil™ Revelations speelt zich af tijdens de periode tussen Resident Evil 4™ en Resident Evil 5™ en bevat een compleet nieuw verhaal over de Resident Evil-personages van het eerste uur: Jill Valentine en Chris Redfield. Daarnaast maken de nieuwe personages Parker Luciani en Jessica Sherawat hun opwachting en zul je met gepaste voorzichtigheid totaal nieuwe omgevingen moeten verkennen.

NZ.name: Resident Evil™ Revelations
NZ.description: Resident Evil™ Revelations for Nintendo 3DS brings a straight shot of spine-chilling terror to the handheld console scene, one that fans of the iconic survival horror series won’t want to miss! Set in the time period between Resident Evil 4™ and Resident Evil 5™, this title features a brand new storyline for series favourites Jill Valentine and Chris Redfield, introduces new characters Parker Luciani and Jessica Sherawat, and offers entirely original environments for players to cautiously explore.

PL.name: Resident Evil™ Revelations
PL.description: Resident Evil™ Revelations for Nintendo 3DS brings a straight shot of spine-chilling terror to the handheld console scene, one that fans of the iconic survival horror series won’t want to miss! Set in the time period between Resident Evil 4™ and Resident Evil 5™, this title features a brand new storyline for series favourites Jill Valentine and Chris Redfield, introduces new characters Parker Luciani and Jessica Sherawat, and offers entirely original environments for players to cautiously explore.

PT.name: Resident Evil™ Revelations
PT.description: Resident Evil™ Revelations para a Nintendo 3DS traz para a nova consola da Nintendo o terror que os fãs da icónica série de survival horror não quererão perder. Este título, que decorre no período entre Resident Evil 4™ e Resident Evil 5™, apresenta um novo enredo para os já conhecidos Jill Valentine e Chris Redfield, novas personagens (Parker Luciani e Jessica Sherawat) e ainda ambientes totalmente originais para exploração.

RU.name: Resident Evil™ Revelations
RU.description: Эта игра доступна только на английском, французском, итальянском, немецком и испанском языках. В игре Resident Evil™ Revelations для Nintendo 3DS страх, заставляющий стынуть кровь в жилах, перебирается на портативную систему. Не пропустите выход новинки из легендарной серии игр ужасов на выживание! Действие игры происходит в промежуток времени между событиями, случившимися в играх Resident Evil 4™ и Resident Evil 5™. В этой игре вы узнаете о своих старых любимцах Jill Valentine и Chris Redfield, познакомитесь с новыми персонажами: Parker Luciani и Jessica Sherawat, а также сможете тщательно исследовать новые интересные локации.

SE.name: Resident Evil™ Revelations
SE.description: Resident Evil™ Revelations for Nintendo 3DS brings a straight shot of spine-chilling terror to the handheld console scene, one that fans of the iconic survival horror series won’t want to miss! Set in the time period between Resident Evil 4™ and Resident Evil 5™, this title features a brand new storyline for series favourites Jill Valentine and Chris Redfield, introduces new characters Parker Luciani and Jessica Sherawat, and offers entirely original environments for players to cautiously explore.
